fullDescription.intro: This node adds a Keras Masking Layer to an existing deep learning network.

tab.name: Options
tab.option: For each timestep in the input tensor (first dimension), if all values in the input tensor at that timestep are equal to mask_value, then the timestep will be masked (skipped) in all downstream layers (as long as they support masking).

ports.inPort: The network to append the layer to.
